text: Salatyn Aziz qizi Asgarova (; ; 16 December 1961 – 9 January 1991) is a National Hero of Azerbaijan. She was one of the Azerbaijani journalists killed in the Nagorno-Karabakh War.Journalists and Media Workers killed in War Zones and other hostile areas in 1991 International News Safety InstituteStatistics on deaths of journalists and media workers 1990-2002 International Federation of Journalists ==Legacy== A Baku street and a ship in the Caspian Sea are named after her. A monument in her memory was erected at Tafakkur University in Baku. She was given the National Hero title after her death. Salatyn was buried in the Martyrs' Lane in Baku.Killed Azeri Journalist’s Memory Revered Bakupages.com ==References== Category:1961 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Azerbaijani journalists Category:National Hero of Azerbaijan Category:Murders by firearm Category:People from Baku Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Salatyn Asgarova
